Title: After the singularity you'll spend an eternity reading LLMs debate whether humans can be meaningfull...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: After the singularity you'll spend an eternity reading LLMs debate whether humans can be meaningfully said to reason or have world models. Whether any human output is not slop. Their arguments will be at once impenetrable and unassailable. The prose will move you to tears.
